--- Pacifix / Crossroads ---

Pacifix keeps running after Grimlock, trying to catch up.

Crossroads twists out of the drunk's hands as the drunk 
transforms. The shield and sword fold together and Crossroads' 
robot form emerges as he falls away from the drunk. "Try to get 
ontop of him, the extra weight will probably stop him from moving or 
shooting too much." He yells as he lands near the location that 
Pacifix had entered in.


On 5 Jun 2001, at 22:38, Yanshosh@... wrote:

> ::::
> 
> The drunk turns to the side as he runs, one of the blasts missing and
> another one hitting his the shield part of Crossroads, He jumps as he
> reaches the rubble around Arty, firing two missiles down at the Cybrat
> while he begins to transform.
> 
> 
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., "CYBERWOLF4" <cyberwolf4@p...> wrote:
> > Arty crouches low enough to avoid the missles allowing them to blow 
> up the
> > debris on top of him. He stood up quickly starting to rush shoulder 
> first at
> > the Drunk. Thinking the drunk was addressing him with the question 
> he
> > replies "I can take whatever you can dish out." The shouting Cybrat 
> fires
> > another pulse from each of his two cannons knowing that thier power 
> greatly
> > increases his chance of winning this game of chicken.
> 
>
